name: TransShapes
description:
This is T4IG's submission to the UE4 Spring Jam 2018! The theme was "Transformation".

We created an arcade-style SHMUP where you're in control of an adorable little blue sphere with a shotgun and the ability to transform into a green cube or yellow pyramid with other weapons and abilities.

Designed to be a coop game! Bring your friend (and Hamachi)!
